feed.title: Tachiyomi
feed.subtitle: Tachiyomi is an open-source Android app that lets you read any manga from your smartphone - faster and easier than ever.

entry.title: Bato.to manga error
entry.summary: **bato.to** is currently showing errors for manga with more than 1000 chapter views.
entry.content: bato.to is currently showing errors for manga with more than 1000 chapter views.
